subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RADIO SHACK HACK FILES

Radio Shacks website is way messed up.  they are advertising the  12-470 and 
show a photograph of the 12-469 and vice versa.  I have also  been watching 
ebay for last 3 days and the only one that have is a 12-469 for  $18.00 right 
now.  But I shall be watching every day.
 
jeff
